message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product.  Let me know if you're open to that.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  However, $11,000 is still outside my comfort zone. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $9,500. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident I can get good use out of the product.
